title: Ezra Taft Benson "If I vote for the least evil "
subtitle: A viral quote attributed to the former head of the LDS church and United States Secretary of Agriculture Ezra Taft Benson is said to have been spoken in private, and cannot be officially confirmed.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Ezra Taft Benson said that voting for the least evil is still voting for evil, one that will be judged for that.
